findings.rationale: The agreement's obligations continue in perpetuity, which may impose indefinite liability on parties and limit future business flexibility.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions.

findings.rationale: The indemnification clause places unlimited liability on parties, potentially leading to significant financial exposure without clear limits.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The clause stating that neither party's liability shall be limited could lead to substantial financial risk in case of a breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The assignment of all rights in work product to Company A may disadvantage Company B and could lead to disputes regarding ownership.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The prevailing party recovering attorneys' fees could dissuade parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to fear of high legal costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
